reviews.review: Amazingly fun and complex puzzle game. And the fun never stops with the make your own test chamber and workshop that hundreds post in. A good spend of money
Co-Op is a blast.  Single player storyline is fun.  Great game.  Paid $8.50 for the TWO pack on the summer sale!
You are simply experiencing a rare reaction in which the Material Emancipation Grill may have emancipated the ear tubes inside your head.
You use fractions in space to port for one place to another, how is that not fun.
Assolutamente da Avere

Jogo com muitos puzzles brilhantes, além do single player que já é muito bom têm o multiplayer com novos puzzles para resolver em dupla e um mode editor que você pode criar seus próprios puzzles e postá-los para outras pessoas tentarem resolver.
If you don't have this, what's wrong with you?

There's a blue hole and an orange hole. You walk through them.
Then, BOOM. 1000 hours played.
Amazing sotryline! Amazing puzzles! Amazing graphics! Amazing co-op! Amazing everyting! :D

Valve prostě umí!!! Skvělá vtipná a logická hra, jejíž kvalita nejde popsat.
Portal série neuvěřitelně obohatila žánr logických her, a právě druhý díl je vybroušený k naprosté dokonalosti. Navíc díky uživatelským mapám ve workshopu test chambery jen tak nedojdou ;)

Navíc jsem si jist, že Portal série jasně ukazuje, že hry nejsou jen škodlivé, a přesto je plný akce jak pro mladé, tak dospělé. Svůj skvělý příběh podává ve vtipné formě, kdy se musí zasmát i naprostý mrzout.
Geniale Rätsel, genialer Humor!

Que les indécis hésitants n'hésitent plus. Que du bonheur, et disponible en version originale sous-titrée qui plus est! Une durée de vie du scénario principal plutôt réduite mais les salles de test créées par la communauté viennent ajouter des centaines d'heures de jeu potentiel en plus. Et le mode multijoueur est un vrai délice.

Portal 2 is great fun, just how smart are you? You'll find out as you make your way through puzzle after puzzle. The game comes with co-op missions aswell but I recommend finishing single player first so you got a clue what's up and down in the game.

A map editor has been added to the game which you can share on Steam Workshop for other people to play and complete - if they can!

Great game with good replay value!

My score 8/10
Masterpiece.

This game is possibly the best game ever to play you.

edit: still true

A good game, and a head scratcher at times. Wouldn't buy it unless you have someone to play it with as in my opinion it doesn't really have much single player... Stuff? Anyway, I'd definately recommend to anyone who wants a good puzzle game.
One of the best games I've ever played. Totally worth the price.
Awesome game.
This is better then bath salts
Uno de los mejores juegos de la historia, así de simple. Hay que tenerlo sí o sí.
Es una Obra Maestra.

This game is probably one of the few games that I found to be mind challenging. It definitley adds new style to the game when compared to PORTAL. The designers of this game has challenged you and they are certainly happy when they make your mind go nuts. Adding the co-op mode is a great way to include game enjoyment with friends. Even more, you can design your own map levels and put them on workshop for other people to download them, this opens the door for people with great creativity and smartness to create a level one of its kind. Overall, I think that its an amazing game with certainly a good storyline.
Portal 2 лучшее творение VALVE!
So much fun!
Co-op campaign is one the of the best co-ops ever made.
Dans le top 3 des meilleurs jeux de la décennie avec la série Half life et la série Halo
Замечательная игра! Кооператив в ней затягивает как ни в одной другой игре, оторваться невозможно! Хотя второй раз проходить его неинтересно.
Советую - отличное звуковое оформление, графика и физика. Полностью стоит своих денег.
Some of the best game I ever played.
A must have.
For science!
L'un des jeux les plus intelligents, originaux et drôles qui ait vu le jour depuis de nombreuses années !!
Must Have
Smart puzzels, funny story and a cool conclusion to the story that was set with the first Portal. GLaDoS is back!
mixes a great story line with really fun puzzles. and its even better when you play co op.

Valve волшебники от бога. Уровень любой из игр этой студии высок, что это даже иногда вызывает недоумение. Но всему есть своё объяснение. У Valve это, на мой взгляд, чёткая стратегия и высокое внимание к игрокам, к своему комьюнити. Portal 2 показательный тому пример. С момента выхода первой части, игра сильно эволюционировала. Первая как осторожный и опасный эксперимент учёного только прокладывала путь для более уверенной второй части. А здесь Valve уже развернулась по полной, как это они умеют делать.

Un buena continuación de la historia del Portal 1, y un exquisito multijugador cooperativo que te enganchará. Además ahora tendrás horas ilimitadas de juego con los mapas desarrollados por otros usuarios.

Отличная игра!Всё на высоте,а игра с другом по сети вообще супер!
10 из 10
I hate puzzles, i hate this game, it makes me wanna punch my monitor, no clue why i had to buy it, ok had to vent. It does have a cool story though.

muy buen juego con una historia excelente

 recomendado 100%
Liquid fun
Shoot portals at robots. Good Game.
This game was 1000 times better than the first, and I thought Portal 1 was amazing.  Cave Johnson is the most hilarious video game character that I can recall!

i dont need to say anything 

if love Puzzle\FPS games get this game,  now !
Simply amazing.  Fantastic story and brilliant design.

"Portal was a test-bed. Portal 2 is a game." ~Doug Lombardi

This sequel to the awesome first-person puzzle game Portal is twice as awesome. More characters, who are very charismatic, adds a very interesting back-story, has friggin' co-op mode AND you can design your own test chambers with the Perpetual Testing Initiative. Honestly there's not much more you can ask for from a game like this. 10/10 would play again.
awesome game where you get to, who am i kidding, everyone knows about this game!
Bom d+
Can't believe I had to wait so long to play this.  It.  Was.  Amazing.

I would really recommend this game. First of all, let's talk about the single player. 

The single player campaign is just awesome, it got some really great humour in it and is challenging (but not too hard). Every level feels different and you will probably want to play it again. All the characters have a really unique personality. After completing the campaign you can download custom levels from the Steam Workshop to play alone, or with friends. 

So, about the multiplayer part. It's super awesome mega great, to solve puzzles with friends that can't be solved alone feels everytime like a huge accomplishment. Again you can download multiplayer levels in Steam Workshop, so you'll never stop playing. 

The only downside it has; you'll complete the campaign in one run because it's that awesome.

This is probably the best game Valve has ever made.
A masterpiece 5/5
Pretty awesome, graphics are pretty good, story line: Excitement!!!
Macht süchtig, gut wenn man auf Knoten im Gehirn steht und seeehr guter Humor ;-)
Clássico!
empfehlen
^^Genial
Valve never ceases to amaze me. This game is pure awesome.
Müziklerini ve esprilerini duymadan ölmeyin! Onun dışında zaten bildiğimiz Portal.
The voice acting really makes this game
this shit is good
The sequel to one of the best games ever that keeps all the goodness going. Need I say more?

De los mejores juegos que he visto nunca. Imprescindible haberse pasado antes la primera parte si se quiere disfrutar del entramado de la historia. Y por si sabe a poco, el juego en modo cooperativo está muy logrado.
Some of the best writing in a game ever
Non ho parole per questo gioco, stupendo :D (1° gioco ad aver completato tutti gli achievement)
Epic. nuff said.

Par où commencer lorsque l'on parle de Portal ?
Encore une fois, Valve a fait du très beau boulot. Respectant l'ambiance propre au premier du nom, ce deuxième volet se retrouve cependant très différent : Un scénario très profond avec des personnalitées très attachantes, de nouvelles mécaniques de jeu, des puzzles très équilibrés, des graphismes qui rendent hommage au moteur source, une bande-son énorme, un mode co-op très amusant qui nous en dévoile un peu plus sur les secrets d'Aperture Science et un Workshop munie d'un mode de création de map multipliant alors la durée de vie du jeu.

À acheter sans aucune hésitation.
Un juego a tener sin duda alguna.
Well good!
One of the best puzzle adventure games I have ever played.

I can't believe some of you don't own this yet.  What are you waiting for?  This is a seminal piece of gaming history!  Also... it's funny and clever!  FEW DECISIONS IN LIFE HAVE EVER BEEN THIS EASY.  DO IT NOW.

Surprizingly I wasn't bored by playing it, it was fun.
Even though I thought it would be too similar to the first Portal.

The sequel to one of the best games ever made. While not as spot on as it's predecessor it's still amazingly good.
It offers more of everything that Portal had and it does it really really really really good.
If you enjoy Portal you must have this game.
An amazing game with a brilliant storyline, a must play for everyone!
great puzzle game!
Super awesome mind-bending puzzles. Great continuing story from Portal 1. Perfect in every way!!!
The sequel to the most innovative game of our time, and it delivers big time. The co-op levels add a new amount of challenge and let's you play with friends. A win-win. A+ game.
Pure win! Much easier than the first game, but still a blast to play through.
Molto divertente ed appassionante!

If you liked Portal, then Portal 2 adds a brilliant story to the game concept. Portal 2 is one of the most capturing and exciting games I ever played. If you're already a fan of the Half-Life series then Portal 2 is a must.

My favourite game all time! At the end I literally grabbed hold of my keyboard cuz I was so amazed!
The story is great, the gameplay is real fun with just the right amount of difficulty to the puzzles. The atmosphere, the music, the game design...
And GlaDos. Oh. My. God...

Play it and you'll see what I mean.
Ради концовки стоит пройти игру!)

Что тут сказать... Valve умеет делать игры. Интересно, стильно, с юмором. Всем советую.
Me encanta la historia y el sentido del humor de este juego. Ademas tiene cooperativo

Awesome game.
Simply amazing. Best game on Steam so far. Huge fan of the series! HOPE THEY COME OUT WITH PORTAL 3!!
